alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN FALLON AND CENTRAL CUSTER COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM MDT... At 1029 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northeast of Miles City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, half inch hail, heavy rainfall and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ismay, Locate, Westmore, Strawberry Hill Recreation Area, Matthews Recreation Area, Mizpah, and Knowlton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
